title: Zed w/ Blue Buff
body:
Is it wrong for me to ask for a blue buff when I'm a Zed who uses energy rather than mana?
I feel like most junglers won't give me it but I've seen some amazing plays done with Zed w/ blue.

replies.body: peopel are stupid and don't realize that blue buff works for energy regen too because no one reads anything ever in this game.
Yeah they're like,"You're Zed." and won't give me it :'(.
blue is good on zed. CDR and Energy regen OP
